attributes.action: Admit the nation of Palestine to the Eurovision Song Contest.
attributes.additional_details: Palestine borders Europe across the Mediterranean Sea as does Israel, it is therefore only fair that Palestine be allowed to enter the Eurovision Song Contest on an equal par with Israel.
attributes.background: As the nation of Israel is a recognised participant of the Eurovision Song Contest it is only just that the nation of Palestine be afforded the same recognition and be allowed to take part as equal an equal participant.
